comment.author: 59584851@N06
comment._content: Why are they picking beans at night?

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
Good question. Looks like they are ready to go until the wee hours, doesn't it? Maybe working long hours is how they pick so many pounds / day?

Truth be told, I think it is just shadows or an error in processing the print originally. Some of these images are taken from the reports of Extension Agents in the counties and the quality certainly varies. 

Tiah
